contents.text: Welcome to ReadMe in San Francisco, where we help developers say goodbye to static documentation.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For pricing and plans information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details for the enterprise plan
I’d like to review ReadMe’s pricing tiers and ask if there’s a veteran discount available.
I'm looking for a breakdown of subscription tiers and associated API rate-limit pricing.
I’d like to understand the subscription costs and find out if there’s a discount for retirees.
I want to learn about your pricing plans and see if there’s a student discount available.

contents.text: To schedule a product demo with a ReadMe specialist, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a product demo coordinator.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product walkthrough with a ReadMe specialist
I need to schedule a product demo to see how ReadMe’s documentation platform works.
I'd like to arrange a technical demo of the ReadMe platform to evaluate its advanced documentation automation features.
I need someone to walk me through the software features in a live demo.
I’d like to schedule a product demo to see how ReadMe works for documenting my research code.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
One of our integration experts will be with you shortly. Please hold the line.

navigationGoals: Get help integrating ReadMe's API into our system
Can you connect me with someone who can help integrate the ReadMe API into my application?
I need assistance configuring the ReadMe API integration and setting up webhooks in our CI/CD pipeline.
Please help me connect your service to my application; I’m not sure how to use the API.
I need assistance integrating the ReadMe API with my physics lab’s data pipeline.

contents.text: To report a bug or check on an existing support ticket, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team for bug reports.

navigationGoals: Report a bug with the documentation renderer
I want to report a bug I found in the platform and check the status of my existing support ticket.
I want to check the status of my support ticket regarding the SDK bug we reported.
I want to check on the problem I reported earlier and see if it’s been fixed.
I’m calling to report a documentation rendering bug I encountered in the SDK and check on my ticket status.
